content.body: Devin Rousso: This is fantastic! We have a #tc39-tg4-tests@matrix.org:matrix.org channel if you'd like to join! The current state (which I need to document a bit) is that we have our tests in https://github.com/tc39/source-map-tests and Mozilla has landed it as a dependency in their source-map library: https://github.com/mozilla/source-map/pull/505
